headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Car Meet Prize Ride: Grotti Turismo Classic
content:
Dedicated LS Car Meet members who win seven Street Races over the next seven days will earn the keys to the Grotti Turismo Classic, a puristâ€™s vision of a retro sportscar: all muscle and sinew, no frills, and minimal safety regulations.

To unlock access to the LS Car Meet, head over to see Mimi in Cypress Flats. You can find her location by locating the LS Car Meet icon on the GTA Online Map.
